alert.note: Alert for Scott (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 9:06AM EST until January 04 at 3:09PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Morristown TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Scott and Russell Counties. Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Hancock and Scott Counties. Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Hancock and Claiborne Counties. For the Clinch River...including Cleveland VA, Speers Ferry VA, Tazewell TN, NORRIS DAM, MELTON HILL DAM...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA. * WHEN...From this evening to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, County Road 627 just downstream floods. At 21.0 feet, One or two houses are threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this evening to 20.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall to 18.6 feet and begin rising again tomorrow evening. It will rise to 19.8 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1215 AM EST.
